channel.title: Character permissions
channel.description: how do i make my character an admin in the server. Also how do i add commands and find out what the commands are.

item.title: Character permissions
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Okayâ€¦ So to make yourself admin go to Data/Characters and click on your character name. You will then see player-rights = 0 change 0 to 3. To become owner.
1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner

To become donar go to Donor-rights = 0 and change 0 to 1.
To make commands and find commands simply go to Commands.java which can be found at src/server/model/players/packets. Then every word in " " is a command which you would do that word In-Game with :: in front of it. To add commands you can make them or find snipplets or leech from other servers. Goodluck!

Read full topic
